DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety , efficacy calcium metabolism 8 week treatment calcitriol 3 mcg/g ointment versus vehicle , use twice daily , without occlusion , treat child age 2 12 year , plaque psoriasis .
DOC.criteria: Male female 2 12 year age Clinical diagnosis stable mild moderate plaque psoriasis Other form psoriasis Hypercalcemia Past history kidney stone Vitamin D deficiency Other concomitant dermatological disease
